p: Moreover, bornyl acetate was extracted with TC, at least twice as much as with the HD process. The minor differences are mostly explained because of the variability of the raw material from batch to batch. Although, while there were still minor, differences in extraction, especially related to components that were absent from the HD extract, can be explained because of the TCâ€™s ability to extract more selectively than the conventional method alone (for example, with Chinese star anise essential oil).
